quizDescription: Test your knowledge about the DC Universe!

questions.question: Who is Batman's arch-nemesis?
questions.explanation: The Joker, the Clown Prince of Crime, is Batman's most famous and enduring arch-nemesis.

questions.question: What superhero is known as the 'Man of Steel'?
questions.explanation: Superman, also known as the 'Man of Steel' and Clark Kent, is one of the most iconic superheroes in the DC Universe.

questions.question: Which city does Green Arrow protect?
questions.explanation: Green Arrow, also known as Oliver Queen, protects Star City with his exceptional archery skills.

questions.question: Who is the fastest man alive in the DC Universe?
questions.explanation: The Flash, also known as Barry Allen, gains super-speed powers after a freak accident and becomes the fastest man alive.

questions.question: What is the real name of Wonder Woman?
questions.explanation: Wonder Woman's real name is Diana Prince, an Amazonian warrior princess from Themyscira.

questions.question: Who is the king of Atlantis and possesses superhuman strength?
questions.explanation: Aquaman, also known as Arthur Curry, is the king of Atlantis and has superhuman strength, aquatic abilities, and can communicate with marine life.

questions.question: Which villain is known as the 'Caped Crusader'?
questions.explanation: Batman, also known as the 'Caped Crusader' and Bruce Wayne, fights crime in Gotham City using his intellect and gadgets.

questions.question: Which supervillain is an enemy of the Justice League and possesses genius-level intellect?
questions.explanation: Lex Luthor is a brilliant scientist and businessman who is a formidable enemy of the Justice League, particularly Superman.

questions.question: Who is the arch-enemy of the Teen Titans and seeks revenge against the Justice League?
questions.explanation: Deathstroke, also known as Slade Wilson, is a skilled mercenary and assassin, and a major foe of the Teen Titans.

questions.question: Which superhero has a power ring that can create energy constructs based on the user's willpower?
questions.explanation: The Green Lantern Corps is an intergalactic police force, and each member wields a power ring that grants them incredible abilities based on their willpower.
